sentences.description:
Starts a phone call to a contact of yours*.
*NOTE: the contact must be listed in DJames' Vocabulary, in the Contacts tab!
alternatives: 🇬🇧  - "MAKE A CALL TO contact name"
🇬🇧  - "MAKE A PHONE CALL TO contact name"

sentences.intro: Send an SMS to a contact*:
sentences.sentence_2: 🇮🇹  - "SEND A MESSAGE in italian TO contact name"
sentences.description:
Sends an SMS to a contact of yours*. Messaging language MUST be told if it's not English.
*NOTE: the contact must be listed in DJames' Vocabulary, in the Contacts tab!

2-step process:
- 1) First, ASK to send a message to your contact
- 2) Then, WAIT for the second BEEP and dictate!

To use emojis, say:
- 🇬🇧: "EMOJI" + smile / happy / grin / kiss / sunglasses / heart / sad / worried.
- 🇮🇹: "EMOJI" + sorriso / felice / sorrisino / bacio / occhiali da sole / cuore / triste / preoccupato.
alternatives: 🇬🇧  - "WRITE A MESSAGE / AN SMS TO contact name"
🇮🇹  - "WRITE A MESSAGE / AN SMS in italian TO contact name"

sentences.intro: Search & play a song from its album:
sentences.sentence_2: 🇮🇹  - "in italiano, PLAY nome canzone BY nome artista"
sentences.description:
Plays a song in Spotify from its album. Preference is given to your saved tracks and to albums over singles.
NOTE: Song language MUST be told if the song is not in English!
alternatives: 🇬🇧  - "PLAY song name BY THE ARTIST artist name"
🇬🇧  - "PLAY THE SONG song name BY THE ARTIST artist name"
🇮🇹  - "in italiano, RIPRODUCI / METTI nome canzone DI nome artista"
🇮🇹  - "in italiano, FAI PARTIRE nome canzone DELL'ARTISTA / DEL GRUPPO nome artista"
